topic.question: 1. The barber was cutting Mr. Brown's hair at 4 yesterday afternoon. At what time was Mr. Brown getting a haircut?
option: at the same time as the barber

topic.question: 2. Sergeant Walker told his men to hurry. What did he tell them to do?
3. I asked for his opinion. What did I want?
4. Sarah wants you to come right now. When does she want you to come?
5. Robert doesn't speak Spanish and James doesn't either.
6. John goes to bed at midnight every night. But last night he went to bed at 8 o'clock. What time does John usually go to bed?
7. Mr. Richards employs a lot of people.
option: A lot of people work for Mr. Richards.
A lot of people live with Mr. Richards.
A lot of people agree with Mr. Richards.
A lot of people listen to Mr. Richards.

topic.question: 8. The pilot of an aircraft must concentrate on his flight.
option: He must do all his flying at once.
He should be taken off flying every year.
He must give all of his attention to flying.
He must relax his attention when flying.

topic.question: 9. Jane selected a book.
10. Air is invisible.
11. He was a passenger on that bus.
12. Which of these is a meal?
13. The instructor showed us how to transform water. What did he show us?
option: how to make tea with it

topic.question: 14.  The instructor said, "The interior of the house is very beautiful." What part of the house is she talking about?
15. Where is the basement of a building?
option: between the first and second floors

topic.question: 16. Henry was pleased with the acceleration of the car. What did he like?
option: its ability to pick up speed

topic.question: 17. The paramedics rescued the driver. What did they do?
18. She visited us at the hospital.
option: She paid us at the hospital
She came to see us there.

topic.question: 19. James told the clerk, "I want a pack of cigarettes."
option: James wants to see some cigarettes.
James saw some cigarettes in a package.

topic.question: 20. Mary looks like her mother.
option: She is looking for her mother.
She is fond of her mother.

topic.question: 21. Cadet Brown was too late to catch the bus.
option: He did not get off the bus.
He got on the wrong bus.

topic.question: 22. Davis takes part in all kinds of activities.
option: He practices only certain types of activities.
He participates in many types of activities.
He enjoys keeping away from activities.
He dislikes various kinds of activities.

topic.question: 23. Those weapons are destructive.
option: They can cause a lot of damage.

topic.question: 24. I get up every morning at seven.
option: I don't stay in bed after 7:00.

topic.question: 25. The officer ordered, "Come here." What should the soldier do?
26. It rained hard all day yesterday.
option: It hasn't rained for a long time.

topic.question: 27. We are all set to go to the air exhibition at Kelly.
option: We are ready to go to Kelly.
We are setting the plane down at Kelly.
We are sitting in the plane at Kelly.

topic.question: 28. The airplane takes off at eleven hundred hours.
29. Mary wants to serve in the hospital. What does she want to do in the hospital?
30. The accident was caused by the pilot's blurred vision. What caused the accident?
31.  Tom consulted his friend yesterday. What did Tom do?
option: Tom said something bad to him.
He greeted him in the morning.

topic.question: 32. Tony gave Bill permission to drive the car. What did Tony do?
option: He ordered Bill to drive the car.
He allowed Bill to take the car.
He warned Bill not to take the car.
He gave Bill a ride in the car.

topic.question: 33. The student has a cavity. Who should he see?
34. I paid for my car in advance of delivery. When did I pay for it?
35. The meat was too rare.
36. He is the author of these books.
37. The humidity is very high.
option: A hot dry wind is blowing.

topic.question: 38. Bill will go to the doctor if he feels worse tomorrow.
option: Bill might go to the doctor.
Bill won't go to the doctor.

topic.question: 39. Mr. Gerard has no money.
option: He doesn't have any at all.

topic.question: 40. Can you tell me the way to the train station?
option: Are you able to give me the train schedule?
How can I get to the train station?
Can you tell me about the train station?
Can you go to the train station?

topic.question: 41. Mrs. Conner furnished all the food for the graduation party.
42. Before you cash a check, you must endorse it.
option: You must complete an application form.
You must keep it flat at all times.
You must write your name on the back.

topic.question: 43. Colonel and Mrs. Johnson had two guests for dinner.
option: They had two steaks for dinner
They received two invitations to dinner
They had two helping of dessert
They invited two friends to dinner

topic.question: 44. Mrs. Moon went to the bank and cashed a check. What did she do?
option: She put money in the bank.

topic.question: 45. John enjoyed his visit.
option: He got a lot of rest.

topic.question: 46. Mary spent a fourth of her money. How much of it did she spend?
47. Did you find out what caused his illness?
option: Did you learn the reason for his sickness?

topic.question: 48. We'll have to tear down the engine. What will we have to do?
49. The captain crossed out my name on the graduation list. What did he do?
option: He drew a line through my name.
He added my name to the list.
He wrote my name on the list.

topic.question: 50. We took our vacation so long ago I can't remember much about it.
option: Our vacation lasted for a long time.
It has been a long time since our vacation.
It will be a long time until our vacation.
Our vacation will last for a long time.

topic.question: 51. Before shooting at the target, Delores computed the range.
option: She knew the range and hit the target.
She figured out the distance to the target.
She talked to the ranger before shooting at the target.
She shot and hit the target from a great distance.

topic.question: 52. Harold approached the woman.
53.  How long does it take to go from San Antonia to Chicago?
option: by bus, car, train, or plane
It's a long distance between them.
about a day and a half by car

topic.question: 54. Every night the wind dies down. What happens when the wind dies down?
55. A drill is used to remove decay from a tooth.
option: Decay is taken out with a drill.
Decay is put in a drill.
Decay is moved away from the drill.
Decay is placed around a drill.

topic.question: 56. The pilot carried out his mission.

57. W: What do you do for a living?
M: I am a pilot in the air force. What's your job?
W: I am a professor at the university.
Q: What are they discussing?

58. M: Have you seen my new dog?
W: Yes, she is very nice.
Q: How does the woman feel about the dog?

59. M: Louis can't answer this question.
W: That's because she doesn't even understand it.
Q: What does the woman mean?
option: Louis hasn't heard the question correctly.
Louis has been standing in the wrong place.
Louis doesn't know what the question means.

topic.question:
60. W: I am sorry sir, but you can't go in.
M: But I have an official pass.
Q: Why did the man think he should be allowed to enter?
option: He has permission from someone in authority.
He thinks his reason for entering is very important.

topic.question:
61. W: He looks better today, doctor.
M: Good. But how's his appetite?
Q: What does the doctor want to know?
option: if the patient is seeing all right
if the patient is eating all right
if the patient is breathing all right
if the patient is talking all right

topic.question:
62. M: Where does Caroline work?
W: In an automobile factory.
M: What are her duty hours?
W: She works from 9 to 5.
Q: When does Caroline work?

63. W: Why are you holding your hand like that?
M: It's numb.
Q: What did he say about his hand?
option: It has no feeling in it.

topic.question:
64. M: Did you see the new tank?
W: No, but I saw the design for it.
Q: What did the woman see?

65. W: Do you want some help?
M: Yes. Would you please catalog these books so we can find what we want?
Q: What did the man ask the woman to do?
option: Put the books in a neat pile.
List the books in some orderly way.
List the books in some orderly way.
Put the books on a shelf according to

topic.question:
66. M: What's Peter's house like?
W: It is huge.
Q: What did she say about the house?
